behavior brew_coffee_with_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):

        # Ensure the coffee maker is plugged in

        achieve has_water(coffee_maker)
        # Ensure the coffee maker has water

        achieve is_on(coffee_maker)
        # Turn on the coffee maker to start brewing

    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Select the coffee maker
        brew_coffee_with_coffee_maker(coffee_maker)

behavior ensure_coffee_maker_is_ready(coffe_maker:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(coffe_maker) # Ensure the coffee maker has water

behavior brew_coffee(coffe_maker:item, cup:item):
    body:
        achieve plugged(coffe_maker) # Coffee maker must be plugged in to operate
        achieve is_on(coffe_maker) # Turn on the coffee maker to start brewing
        achieve close(cup, coffe_maker) # Ensure the cup is close enough to receive coffee

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffe_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffe_maker)
        # Select a coffee maker
        bind cup: item where:
            is_cup(cup) and close(cup, coffe_maker)
        # Select a cup close to the coffee maker
        ensure_coffee_maker_is_ready(coffe_maker)
        brew_coffee(coffe_maker, cup)

def has_water_in_coffee_maker(coffee_maker:item):
    # Function to check if the coffee maker has water
    return has_water(coffee_maker)

behavior make_coffee(coffee_maker:item):
    body:
        if not has_water_in_coffee_maker(coffee_maker):
            achieve has_water(coffee_maker)
            # Ensure the coffee maker has water

        achieve is_on(coffee_maker)
        # Turn on the coffee maker to start brewing coffee

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind coffee_maker: item where:
            is_coffe_maker(coffee_maker)
        # Select the coffee maker

        make_coffee(coffee_maker)
